name: Acceptance (itch)
description:
Made in a one month time limit for Jam for Leelah, Acceptance is a visual novel adaptation of a Twine game made around three years ago by a Trans woman in the early stages of gender transition.

Designed to reflect some of the day to day challenges of early transition, Acceptance sets out to put players who strongly identify with their birth gender in a position where they have to experience some of the more challenging aspects of how it feels to live life while trans.

Acceptance is a Ren'Py visual novel that should run on Windows, Mac and Linux.

Content Warnings: Transphobic abuse, sexual assault and suicide.
